sourcesContent:
import { Component, EventEmitter, Input, Output } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { Patient } from 'src/app/models/patient.model'; import { PatientsService } from 'src/app/services/patients.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-registration-form', templateUrl: './registration-form.component.html', styleUrls: ['./registration-form.component.scss'], }) export class RegistrationFormComponent { @Input() isModalOpen: boolean = false; @Output() isModalOpenChange = new EventEmitter(); newPatient: Patient = { id: '', firstName: '', lastName: '', personalId: '', dateOfBirth: '', phoneNumber: '', email: '', medicalConditions: [], surgicalHistory: [], medications: [], allergies: [], immunizations: [], doctorsName: '', doctorsSurname: '', insurance: false, }; patientFields: string[] = [ 'first name', 'last name', 'personal id', 'date of birth', 'phone number', 'email', 'medical conditions', 'surgical history', 'medications', 'allergies', 'immunizations', `doctor's name`, `doctor's surname`, ]; canBeEmptyFields: string[] = [ 'medical conditions', 'surgical history', 'medications', 'allergies', 'immunizations', ]; openModal() { this.resetForm(); this.isModalOpenChange.emit(true); } close() { this.resetForm(); this.isModalOpenChange.emit(false); } preventClose(event: Event) { event.stopPropagation(); } private resetForm() { this.newPatient = { id: '', firstName: '', lastName: '', personalId: '', dateOfBirth: '', phoneNumber: '', email: '', medicalConditions: [], surgicalHistory: [], medications: [], allergies: [], immunizations: [], doctorsName: '', doctorsSurname: '', insurance: false, }; } patientForm: FormGroup; constructor( private patientsService: PatientsService, private formBuilder: FormBuilder ) { // Initialize the patientForm with validation rules this.patientForm = this.formBuilder.group({ // Define form controls and add validation rules firstName: ['', Validators.required], lastName: ['', Validators.required], // Add more fields with validators as needed }); } registerPatient() { if (this.patientForm.valid) { // If the form is valid, submit the data this.patientsService.addNewPatient(this.newPatient).subscribe({ next: (response) => { console.log('Patient registered successfully:', response); this.close(); }, error: (error) => { console.error('Error registering patient:', error); }, }); } else { // If the form is invalid, show an error message alert('Please fill in all the required fields.'); } } }
